commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community by %%QkeleQ10%%. It's open source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%github%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions in [this message]%%translate%%.

You can execute `+help <name of command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Here's a list of all commands:
madeBy: | Bot made with lots of care by %%QkeleQ10%%

help.description: Shows ye all available commands an' other info about the bot.

prefix.description: Gives ye the appropriate prefix fer yer language(s).

quote.description: Gets (or adds) a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.

mention.description: Mentions a language role with an optional message.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context fer the given string ID. `+context help` shows ye information about this here command.

issue.description: Opens our GitHub issues page, where you can report problems and send feedback.

language.description: Changes yer language, shows yer current one or shows a list of available languages.

invite.description: Gives you an invite link to the server - please use this one whenever you want to invite a friend.

guide.description: Gives a link to the official thread regarding translations by the Hypixel team.

hypixel.description: Gives you useful information regarding the Hypixel Crowdin project.

quickplay.description: Gives you useful information about the Quickplay project.

skyblockaddons.description: Gives you useful information about the SkyblockAddons project.

thread.description: Gives you a link to the thread announcing this discord.

twitter.description: Gives you a link to the official Hypixel Translators Community Twitter page.
